title: Inverted question/exclamation height and type styles
content: Are inverted question marks that sit at the x-height appropriate in both serif and sans type?
author: James Puckett

comments.content:
What do you mean by "sit at the x-height"? The top of the thing is at the x-height? I think I generally position them by putting the bottom at the descender depth, IIRC.

But in any case, there is no difference for serif and sans serif in this regard.

Cheers,

T

_But in any case, there is no difference for serif and sans serif in this regard._

I agree with Thomas, James.
